statusLine.command: input=$(cat); total_in=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.context_window.total_input_tokens // 0'); total_out=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.context_window.total_output_tokens // 0'); ctx_size=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.context_window.context_window_size // 200000'); total=$((total_in + total_out)); pct=$((total * 100 / ctx_size)); [ $pct -lt 50 ] && ind='ðŸŸ¢' || [ $pct -lt 75 ] && ind='ðŸŸ¡' || [ $pct -lt 90 ] && ind='ðŸŸ ' || ind='ðŸ”´'; fmt() { [ $1 -ge 1000 ] && echo "$((${1}/1000))K" || echo "$1"; }; printf "%s %s/%s (%d%%) â†‘%s â†“%s" "$ind" "$(fmt $total)" "$(fmt $ctx_size)" "$pct" "$(fmt $total_in)" "$(fmt $total_out)"
